name: Pass.Beacons
desc: An object that represents the identify of a Bluetooth Low Energy beacon the system uses to show a relevant pass.

items.name: major
items.desc: The major identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

items.name: minor
items.desc: The minor identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

items.name: proximityUUID
items.desc: The unique identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

items.name: relevantText
items.desc: The text to display on the lock screen when the pass is relevant. For example, a description of a nearby location, such as “Store nearby on 1st and Main”.
